page.title: 10Biography_Dinah Lampitt.
page.content: Dinah Lampitt as the authoress of three best_selling novels,'Sutton Place','The Silver Swan'&'Fortune's Soldier',is one of Mayfield's celebraties.Having enjoyed writing & history since a child,it was natural that her career should bring the two together.Miss Lampitt feels her books provide a means of communicating to a great many people at one time.In order to meet the Publisher's deadline of one book per year,Miss Lampitt finds she must write for six hours each day. However she still finds time to take an active role in village amateur dramatics,including the Women's Institute annual pantomime & the productions of the newly re_formed Mayfield Players.Miss Lampitt also takes an active & supportive role in the preservation & conservation of the local environment.
